title: How it feels to fight Graves now.
body:
http://33.media.tumblr.com/a5bd7b848a25ea821297c400128f2957/tumblr_inline_ncu63ohSkH1qkyfep.gif

Note to self: Do not take Shotgun lightly

replies.body: Did you stand in the gunpowder?    I've been playing him a lot and people tend to do that.

You mean the half invisible gunpowder ?

You notice it only when it's too late....

Maybe I notice it better because I played him a lot. I was able to dodge most from my mirror match up.

Edit: though it is horrifying in cluster fuck teamfights. Kinda like GP's barrels.

people don't read patch notes or pay attention to pbe so they stand in his Q and also hugely underestimate his burst damage in melee range when all the bullets hit...but he sure is more "shotgunny" now..i really like the rework.
I think the knockback from his shotgun might be a bit much, but I'll just wait for the next few patches to see what Riot does with him.
He's a true CertainlyT champ. He's got a knock around, unlike those weaklings Morde and Cait.

"WHOA WHOA WHOA!"
"What? It was obvious! He's the red spy! Watch, he'll turn red any second now. . ."
